name: Pipe Out
shortDescription: A classic plumbing puzzle game where you rotate pipe pieces to create a continuous fluid path. Features four difficulty levels, a daily spin wheel for rewards, and detailed status tracking.
fullDescription:
Pipe Out is an engaging and colorful pipe connection puzzle game. Your main objective is to establish a continuous pipeline by tapping and rotating the given pipe segments on the grid, allowing the liquid to flow from the start point to the end point.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Difficulty Modes: Challenge yourself across four distinct difficulty categories: Easy, Medium, Advance, and Hard. Each difficulty typically contains 50 levels, offering hundreds of puzzles to solve.
  • Game Status Tracking: Keep track of your mastery with a 'Game Status' screen that monitors 'Level Completed' and 'Average Time' for each difficulty level.
  • Daily Rewards: Spin the 'Daily Wheel' to earn valuable coins and in-game currency to help your progression.
  • Helpful Hints: Use coins to acquire and utilize hints when you get stuck on a tricky level.
  • Simple Mechanics: Features intuitive one-tap controls for rotating pipe pieces, making it easy for players of all ages to pick up.
  • Customizable Settings: Control in-game sound and music through the settings menu.
